about.aboutH1: Let me tell you something about me
about.aboutP: I AM AN ADAPTABLE PERSON, DETERMINED TO ACHIEVE MY GOALS, I LIKE CHALLENGES AND WORKING BY OBJECTIVES; I AM A SELF-TAUGHT, COMMITTED, SELF-MOTIVATED PERSON, I ENJOY BOTH TEAM AND INDIVIDUAL WORK, I AM ENTHUSIASTIC AND PASSIONATE ABOUT PROGRAMMING AND TECHNOLOGY.
about.greeting: HELLO, THANK YOU FOR REVIEWING MY PORTFOLIO, I HOPE WE CAN WORK TOGETHER AND DO AMAZING PROJECTS, HAVE A GREAT DAY!
